mapper.select: SELECT bbs_clsf_cd, bbs_nm, wrt_authrt_lvl_val, cmnt_wrt_authrt_lvl_val, crt_dt, del_dt FROM boards ORDER BY crt_dt DESC;
SELECT bbs_clsf_cd, bbs_nm, bbs_prps_cn, wrt_authrt_lvl_val, cmnt_wrt_authrt_lvl_val FROM boards WHERE bbs_clsf_cd = #{boardCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (bbs_clsf_cd, bbs_nm, bbs_prps_cn, wrt_authrt_lvl_val, cmnt_wrt_authrt_lvl_val, bbs_creatr_user_no, crt_dt) VALUES (#{bbsClsfCd}, #{bbsNm}, #{bbsPrpsCn}, #{wrtAuthrtLvlVal}, #{cmntWrtAuthrtLvlVal}, #{bbsCreatrUserNo}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET bbs_nm = #{bbsNm}, bbs_prps_cn = #{bbsPrpsCn}, wrt_authrt_lvl_val = #{wrtAuthrtLvlVal}, cmnt_wrt_authrt_lvl_val = #{cmntWrtAuthrtLvlVal}, mdfcn_dt = NOW() WHERE bbs_clsf_cd = #{bbsClsfCd};
UPDATE boards SET del_dt = NOW() WHERE bbs_clsf_cd = #{boardCode};
UPDATE boards SET del_dt = NULL WHERE bbs_clsf_cd = #{boardCode};
